State Rep: Donna Howard, D-Austin, made the claim during a press conference in August 2016.
The claim was based on research posted o: 3. The Economic Policy Institute used data from a 2014 survey conducted by Child Care Aware for America to compare child care costs with college tuition.
The comparison showed that in some state: child care costs for infants and 4-year-olds exceeded the average price of in-state public college tuition.
